name: Brisbane Quarters
description:
Welcome to Brisbane Quarters, a new unique and chic boutique hostel located in the heart of the
city. Whether you’re a backpacker, flash-packer or a budget traveller, #BQ caters for everyone and
has everything you need for an unforgettable experience in the Queensland Capital.

On our doorstep is a vibrant city waiting for you… Head to Queen Street Mall if you are in need of
some retail therapy, or kick-back and relax in Roma Street Parklands for some down-time in the
sunshine before heading out to Fortitude Valley in the evening for a cocktail or more. Whatever
brings you to Brisbane, we guarantee it is only a stone’s throw away.

Combining contemporary and vintage designs with a tropical twist, our interior will leave you
#decodreaming. Boasting over forty individually designed bedrooms spread over four floors, we
have an eclectic mix of private and shared rooms, dorms and pods to suit every style of traveller. 

All of our rooms are air conditioned to keep you cool from Brisbane’s subtropical climate and to ensure
a cosy night’s sleep under the covers. Lockers, reading-lights and USB ports are provided throughout,
so if you have forgotten your international plug – don’t worry we’ve got you covered, and with free
unlimited WIFI, you can browse as long as your heart desires.

Whether you are here to meet fellow backpackers, or simply take time for yourself, there is no
better place to stay than Brisbane Quarters. Featuring an outdoor pool, library, entertainment and
fitness area we have a variety of facilities for you to enjoy at your leisure.

So, come and join us at Brisbane’s newest and hottest hostel – our inner-city sanctuary awaits you…

Note - We are unable to provide accommodation for any guests under the age of 18

houseRules.notes:
COVID-19 NEWS
Due to our facilities and room types we  cannot accommodate guess who have arrived after March 16th in rooms with shared facilities.

We can accommodate you in rooms with adequate facilities however, rates and conditions of accommodation will need to be discussed with management prior to booking/checking in. 

Brisbane Quarters reserves the right to not accommodate anyone who they believe may put our staff or guests at risk. We apologise for any inconvenience caused and we appreciate your understanding in these exceptional circumstances.



Credit card details entered are to secure your reservation and will only be charged if you fail to show up or cancel within 48 hours of your original booking. A cancellation fee equal to 1 night stay will apply.

We are unable to provide accommodation for any guests under the age of 18

Check In: 2:00PM
Check Out: 10:00AM

 A current passport is required for shared accommodation (dorms) and must be provided at check in. 

We reserve the right to refuse accommodation and charge bookings the first night of accommodation if a passport cannot be presented. 

We reserve the right to refuse accommodation to guests that we suspect are under the influence of alcohol and drugs.

We reserve the right to evict guests that do not adhere to house rules.
